summary: Completed comprehensive testing of AutoParts E-commerce application. Backend APIs fully functional, frontend working with minor UI interaction issues.

resolved_issues.issue: ObjectId serialization error in cart and order endpoints
resolved_issues.fix_applied: Added _id field cleanup in cart and order creation endpoints

ui_bugs.issue: filter-detal testid not found, may be missing data-testid attribute
Cart drawer may not open automatically after adding product
External order button testid not found

integration_issues.issue: Modal overlay intercepting cart button clicks

success_percentage.frontend: 85% (Most core functionality working, minor UI interaction issues)

action_item_for_main_agent: Fix minor UI interaction issues: 1) Add missing data-testid attributes for filter buttons and external order button, 2) Fix modal overlay issues preventing cart button clicks, 3) Ensure cart drawer opens automatically after adding products
